title: Creative Thinking and Expression – Communicating through the Arts
subject: Learning Standards for Early Childhood (2024-)

document.title: Pennsylvania Learning Standards for Early Childhood PRE-KINDERGARTEN

D1C9E2CFCD3C42418C927199350FCDA2.description: Respond at appropriate times (laugh, sigh) at others’ performance .

2D080C8D03F644749F386381D43B7F5B.description: Respond through humming, swaying, tapping foot to others’ work .

A769DD64C6674722BF5A5EC000324548.description: Respond through body language, facial expression, or oral language .

C39DE2A27F004E87A996134A6B39FC83.description:
Demonstrate an emotional response to viewing or
creating various works of art.

FF03E9D590A7432CB4660FBBE3FA51BE.description: Aesthetic Response to Works in the Arts

9233118022D44A56A2227734E66F7E20.description: Share an opinion about artwork when asked, “What do you think this is about?”

CAAC585C880B4161A6D31D4F5F53D450.description: Observe, applaud, or comment on the works of others .

89D74D0773A448A3B0F3706F1BFE29A5.description: Formulate and share an opinion about others’ art products.

C353DB8CD7734F4C9C89A737C476E25D.description: Identify a photo, painting, drawing, dance, and songs

2702C258501F4DDF9841BF99DCC67A14.description: Recognize and name a variety of art forms.

0ECED0B511E44B53B298A8EAB45FFDE5.description: Identify cultures represented by various art forms .

9AA1882FE4DC48F1BD5F7CB50DDC22EE.description: Participate in discussions about where various instruments and art forms originate .

08CB7C6B9F6E4AA19BDB4F86351A44CD.description: Explain that instruments or art forms represent cultural perspectives.

FB36D649C3734B28986D036DEFDA3C98.description: Historical and Cultural Context of Works in the Arts

6DEFA780BD12429983399D2A62439E5E.description: Use recording devices (e .g ., digital camera, video recorder) to capture works in progress and finished works of art .

13A1DC1B0795410FAA685D3443972A8D.description: Use age-appropriate digital media applications to create works of art .

F71C136B1AB84ABA8ACD8B42124B1629.description: Manipulate materials in a variety of ways (e .g ., pounding, squeezing, cutting, rolling) .

9396B9FA12CE4BBB93175AA785D1D824.description: Use art materials and tools as intended .

71343F6DBAEA4BC682EC7A2BB9AA5340.description: Choose art center during free choice .

D12BE37EE92C4C33AAAFE28305096DDC.description: Participate in teacher-guided visual arts activities .

729C7C902F024D0DAB44053268D0706E.description: Explore a variety of art materials and tools .

12E97A5455E443BA99D0722201A17908.description: Use a variety of technologies for producing works of art.

A3EBE43107C6459F9633DE99A777E913.description: Choose different art materials to represent different types of thoughts or feelings .

E95E5D5D28314AD1B1E934CD4DA7E47C.description: Use a growing number of details and make more realistic representations .

3185FD68B287484E881FD0388F4EF9F0.description: Create a work of art to represent a real or imagined object, animal, or person .

BCF4DEEBD6C142BDB8531738FD65A02B.description: Choose art center during free choice .

D81DECD17F67413FBD58F23B2CDD0E05.description: Participate in teacher-guided visual arts activities .

447AB381D3CC4B4BABF6A4DA328C9C01.description:
Use imagination and creativity
to express self through visual arts.

0BA3FC22E7234C569F4CD9230150F40F.description: Draw to explore and extend themes in the classroom .

65E3471965B04CF7B46526C0CD76F709.description: Use a variety of materials (e .g ., chalk, paint, crayons, pencils, markers, wood, playdough) .

219C0671235045789F87C0E027F4CDA4.description: Choose art center during free choice .

87672663B8CE468F9A459BD397FCF7EE.description: Participate in teacher-guided visual arts activities .

14623B1E3DCD42879DF6C5DA340878AF.description: Combine a variety of materials to create a work of art.

0AB3BC0AB6F64F19BCF2CE3AC378E943.description: Create a picture using different colors, varying the intensity of strokes and combining colors .

DF633B4133B24A948D29EB972815ABE0.description: Choose art center during free choice .

B15171B286334AC696B2CBDC64803360.description: Participate in teacher-guided visual arts activities .

818D236DD2D8436C8D1F0A5D2F5A1005.description: Know and use basic elements of visual arts.

FCDFE5A9A802482D8E992DEB5EDD2435.description: Use props and costumes during dramatic play .

95496D7D7B0042C2AF4F41F110ACF45C.description: Imitate roles of people, animals, or objects observed in life experiences .

241824E934BE47D28F68739A0A95C7D9.description: Represent fantasy and real-life experiences through pretend play .

B16C7635E4C340B58691974975CBA690.description: Use nonconforming objects to create representations of real-life objects or activities .

DB0DE58DE0F0404FB72DBCF6D1464D4D.description:
Use imagination and creativity
to express self through dramatic play.

D44A7B5D36A1428191E0B659F876FBF3.description: Act out stories with guidance of the adult .

CB0CA164D9CF426A9773C341920D259B.description: Direct peers or follow peers’ instructions about dramatic play schemes .

19026279802F480D8685DAB4F9CAF5AD.description: Use recording devices (e .g ., voice recorder, video recorder) to capture music and/or movement performances .

9C63FAC327F441C7BE2C4C537AC4919A.description: Use a variety of props to enhance movement activities (e .g ., scarves, beanbags, ribbons) .

EF442C9FB2F248E6B1E6AC17BA291976.description: Use age appropriate digital media applications to create music .

EA9A3254958040BC909A11745285B76E.description: Use a variety of technologies for producing or performing works of art.

34CF760C55694364AC24E8F55327C454.description: Use body to represent form in space, finger plays, or stories .

92D3E088A6054C2883277794535DE49E.description: Change words or tune of familiar songs to make new songs .

Use imagination and creativity
to express self through music and dance.

8EFAF55C1B454E53AF351078D756521B.description: Dance to different types of music .

14A74E4D6FDA493CBC7B294CBFA2B9CD.description: Sing familiar songs, chants, and finger plays .

Respond to different types of music and dance through
participation and discussion.

938B91EF93B5417A93E4EEDBB63A87EC.description: Participate in group movement activities demonstrating an awareness of shared space .

C59A3487641A4800AFB29464F1CCD1B8.description: Participate in teacher-guided music and movement activities .
